examples.question: How many items were found at 7pm?
examples.sql: SELECT count(*) AS count FROM Gegenstand WHERE strftime('%H', FundDatum) = '19';

examples.question: In welchem Monat wurden die meisten Gegenst√§nde verloren?
examples.sql: SELECT strftime('%Y-%m', g.FundDatum) AS Monat, COUNT(*) AS AnzahlVerloren FROM Gegenstand g JOIN PersonGegenstand pg ON g.gid = pg.idGGST WHERE pg.FinderVerlierer = 0 GROUP BY Monat ORDER BY AnzahlVerloren DESC LIMIT 1;
